column5: Hello all I finally re registered on the new board it looks great. Heading down to Amelia Island Florida and was wondering if anyone has fished there and what they caught. Thought I might toss a few shrimp in and see what happens.
check out FLoridasportsman.com  good folks over there always willing to help out

I agree, I don't know Amelia Island but I found out some basic fishing info via the Florida Sportsman site, same thing as bassman's link.  Good luck, I was just in Florida last week and had a great time fishing, went on a couple of bass lakes and then fished from a dock in Melbourne.  Mike
